description: Two men, aged 30 and 34, are in custody after police were called to reports of a man with a gun.
title: Two arrested after woman threatened with gun
title_page: Stoke-on-Trent: Two arrested after woman threatened with gun - BBC News
maintext:
Two men have been arrested after a woman was reported to have been threatened with a gun.
Police were called to the incident, which happened outside a house on Wellesley Street in Shelton, Stoke-on-Trent, shortly after 10:00 GMT on Friday.
The two men, aged 30 and 34, were arrested on suspicion of possession of a firearm with intent to cause fear of violence, Staffordshire Police said.
The 30-year-old man was also arrested on suspicion of false imprisonment. Both men remain in custody.
